trans-unit.source: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage backup jobs | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage backup jobs | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in to view and manage scheduled, currently running, and completed backup jobs.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager MMC snap-in to view and manage scheduled, currently running, and completed backup jobs.

trans-unit.source: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage backup jobs
trans-unit.target: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to view and manage backup jobs

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The **Jobs** node in the **Scope** pane shows the **Scheduled**, **Last 24 hours**, and **Running** backup tasks that you initiated interactively or by a configured policy.
trans-unit.target: The **Jobs** node in the **Scope** pane shows the **Scheduled**, **Last 24 hours**, and **Running** backup tasks that you initiated interactively or by a configured policy.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how you can use the **Jobs** node to display information about scheduled, recent, and currently running backup jobs.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how you can use the **Jobs** node to display information about scheduled, recent, and currently running backup jobs.

trans-unit.source: (The list of jobs and corresponding information appears in the **Results** pane.) Additionally, you can right-click a listed job and see a context menu that lists available actions.
trans-unit.target: (The list of jobs and corresponding information appears in the **Results** pane.) Additionally, you can right-click a listed job and see a context menu that lists available actions.

trans-unit.source: View scheduled jobs
trans-unit.target: View scheduled jobs

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to view scheduled backup jobs.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to view scheduled backup jobs.

trans-unit.source: To view scheduled jobs
trans-unit.target: To view scheduled jobs

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Scheduled**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Scheduled**.

trans-unit.source: The following information appears in the **Results** pane:
trans-unit.target: The following information appears in the **Results** pane:

trans-unit.source: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot
trans-unit.target: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot

trans-unit.source: **Next Run** – the date and time of the next scheduled snapshot
trans-unit.target: **Next Run** – the date and time of the next scheduled snapshot

trans-unit.source: **Last Run** – the date and time of the most recent scheduled snapshot
trans-unit.target: **Last Run** – the date and time of the most recent scheduled snapshot

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] For one-time only snapshots, the **Next Run** and **Last Run** will be the same.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] For one-time only snapshots, the **Next Run** and **Last Run** will be the same.

trans-unit.source: Scheduled backup jobs
trans-unit.target: Scheduled backup jobs

trans-unit.source: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.
trans-unit.target: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.

trans-unit.source: View recent jobs
trans-unit.target: View recent jobs

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to view backup and restore jobs that were completed in the last 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to view backup and restore jobs that were completed in the last 24 hours.

trans-unit.source: To view recent jobs
trans-unit.target: To view recent jobs

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Last 24 hours**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Last 24 hours**.

trans-unit.source: The **Results** pane shows backup jobs for the last 24 hours (to a maximum of 64 jobs).
trans-unit.target: The **Results** pane shows backup jobs for the last 24 hours (to a maximum of 64 jobs).

trans-unit.source: The following information appears in the **Results** pane, depending on the **View** options you specify:
trans-unit.target: The following information appears in the **Results** pane, depending on the **View** options you specify:

trans-unit.source: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot.
trans-unit.target: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot.

trans-unit.source: **Started** – the date and time when the snapshot began.
trans-unit.target: **Started** – the date and time when the snapshot began.

trans-unit.source: **Stopped** – the date and time when the snapshot finished or was terminated.
trans-unit.target: **Stopped** – the date and time when the snapshot finished or was terminated.

trans-unit.source: **Elapsed** – the amount of time between the **Started** and **Stopped** times.
trans-unit.target: **Elapsed** – the amount of time between the **Started** and **Stopped** times.

trans-unit.source: **Status** – the state of the recently completed job.
trans-unit.target: **Status** – the state of the recently completed job.

trans-unit.source: **Success** indicates that the backup was created successfully.
trans-unit.target: **Success** indicates that the backup was created successfully.

trans-unit.source: **Failed** indicates that the job did not run successfully.
trans-unit.target: **Failed** indicates that the job did not run successfully.

trans-unit.source: **Information** – the reason for the failure.
trans-unit.target: **Information** – the reason for the failure.

trans-unit.source: **Bytes processed (MB)** – the amount of data from the volume group that was processed (in MBs).
trans-unit.target: **Bytes processed (MB)** – the amount of data from the volume group that was processed (in MBs).

trans-unit.source: Jobs that ran in the last 24 hours
trans-unit.target: Jobs that ran in the last 24 hours

trans-unit.source: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.
trans-unit.target: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.

trans-unit.source: Delete a job
trans-unit.target: Delete a job

trans-unit.source: View currently running jobs
trans-unit.target: View currently running jobs

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedure to view jobs that are currently running.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedure to view jobs that are currently running.

trans-unit.source: To view currently running jobs
trans-unit.target: To view currently running jobs

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Running**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Scope** pane, expand the **Jobs** node, and click **Running**.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the **View** options you specify, the following information appears in the **Results** pane:
trans-unit.target: Depending on the **View** options you specify, the following information appears in the **Results** pane:

trans-unit.source: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot.
trans-unit.target: **Name** – the name of the scheduled snapshot.

trans-unit.source: **Started** – the date and time when the snapshot began.
trans-unit.target: **Started** – the date and time when the snapshot began.

trans-unit.source: **Checkpoint** – the current action of the backup.
trans-unit.target: **Checkpoint** – the current action of the backup.

trans-unit.source: **Status** – the percentage of completion.
trans-unit.target: **Status** – the percentage of completion.

trans-unit.source: **Elapsed** – the amount of time that has passed since the backup began.
trans-unit.target: **Elapsed** – the amount of time that has passed since the backup began.

trans-unit.source: **Average throughput (MB)** – the median amount of data delivered, expressed in megabytes (MBs).
trans-unit.target: **Average throughput (MB)** – the median amount of data delivered, expressed in megabytes (MBs).

trans-unit.source: **Bytes processed (MB)** – the amount of data from the volume group that was processed (in MBs).
trans-unit.target: **Bytes processed (MB)** – the amount of data from the volume group that was processed (in MBs).

trans-unit.source: **Bytes written (MB)** – the amount of data that was written to the backup (in MBs).
trans-unit.target: **Bytes written (MB)** – the amount of data that was written to the backup (in MBs).

trans-unit.source: Jobs currently running
trans-unit.target: Jobs currently running

trans-unit.source: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.
trans-unit.target: To perform additional actions on a specific job, right-click the job name in the **Results** pane and select from the menu options.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: [Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to manage the backup catalog](storsimple-snapshot-manager-manage-backup-catalog.md).
trans-unit.target: [Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to manage the backup catalog](storsimple-snapshot-manager-manage-backup-catalog.md).
